title: Christmas Tree Shortage, Chante Moore, Stevie Wonder, MTH, Pimpin', NFL Picks, Closing Remarks and more.
itunes:title: Christmas Tree Shortage, Chante Moore, Stevie Wonder, MTH, Pimpin', NFL Picks, Closing Remarks and more.
description:
Fool #2 opens the show and Fool #1 talks about his show in SC. There is a specific type of Christmas Tree shortage that is countrywide due to the recession of 2008. Chante Moore stops by to discuss her Christmas Album. Stevie Wonder is raising money for the victims of the wildfires at The Staples Center. Fool #2 murders another one while talking about Christmas sidepiece etiquette. Pimpin' is back with his NFL picks. Today, Closing Remarks covers the grass is greener saying and The CEO makes some interesting points and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
